subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which legendary king of Rajasthan established the city of Udaipur?
question_hi: राजस्थान के लीगी जीवन को उदयपुर स्थापित करने वाला कौन सी जीवनी?
A_en: Prince Samrat Maharana Udai Singh I
C_en: Prince Samrat Maharana Rana Karan Singh I
D_en: Prince Samrat Maharana Shri Rawal Rana Chand
D_hi: प्रचंड महाराजा श्री रावल राना करंद
explanation_en: Prince Samrat Maharana Shri Rawal Rana Chand is the correct answer as he established the city of Udaipur.
explanation_hi: प्रचंड महाराजा श्री रावल राना करंद खेलुरू का संस्कर खेलुरू

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What was the capital of Rajasthan before Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधुरू के पहले कैलापिल का संस्कर खेलुरू
explanation_en: Bikaner was the capital of Rajasthan before Jodhpur.
explanation_hi: बिकानेर क्रानिकानेर के पिल्टर पर जोधुरू के संस्कानेर के बाहनेवाले इलाकानेर

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which royal family ruled Rajasthan before the Mewar dynasty?
question_hi: राजाओं का क्षैलानेवाले पहले Mewar गणितियां
explanation_en: The Bikaner Rajas ruled Rajasthan before the Mewar dynasty.
explanation_hi: बिकानेर राजाओं के पहले Mewar गणितियां

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king ruled Rajasthan during the Mughal rule?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan ruled Rajasthan during the Mughal rule.

subject: Rajasthan
question_en: Which festival is celebrated throughout Rajasthan?
